samples.question: Can you describe an event you attended recently?
samples.transcript: >> there are many event I attend recently. but if I have to pick one, it could be my birthday. It was on 25th February. I remember there was some stern friend come to my house and celebrate with me. we had a lot of fun and we play game. we ate my watering food and we sank together. after that my friends give me a cake and sang happy birthday to me. We laugh a lot and took photos together. Then my husband gave me a spaceuit. This were a diamond ring and I was really over the moon. H such a special birthday that I enjoy with the people I love the most in the world. in the future I will always celebrate with my wonderful family and my cute.

samples.transcript: University campus I was the host of the event I was feeling pretty nervous I was like oh my God I can do that there is a lot of people in front of me and I have to speak in Korean my Korean then was not as good as now at least I could say pretty basic stuff so being host was pretty Troublesome for me however I actually I try to encourage myself it is just like one of my new experience there is nothing to worry about just be brave get in there try it I eventually overcame my fears and I did okay and did the other people enjoy this event yes they did I guess actually there was a lot of activities people dancing a lot of a lot of variety of people coming from different places of the world like OB big people Japanese people Chinese people each group actually was performing their traditional or typical dancing as well there was actually pretty like a different variety of food like we had French we had usbek Pakistani we have Indian food we had a lot of pretty different sweets as well we had like Arabian sweets we had also like Korean cuisine so people enjoyed food enjoyed fun they had they had a lot of good time back then okay and would you would you like to do this again being the host I do not think so CU because actually like I said I was pretty feeling nervous however if I would like to do it once again I would like to be this time like one of the crowds enjoy my time without any fears without thinking whether the crowd actually or the audience have like is having fun or not.

samples.question: Do you meet people more often now or did you meet more people in the past?
samples.transcript: Well, I would have to I say I definitely I think I was more sociable in the past because back in my college days, college days to be exact because I did not have much, you know, like I was not tied down to a job or like work or like whatever. So yeah, back then I think I was definitely more able to go out and meet new people, but nowadays I mean obviously since I have a job >> and yeah, that does not sometimes my job does not enable me to enable much free time or whatever whatsoever. So yeah. >> Okay.
